CustomField.formula: CASE ( Issue_Type__c , "Address incomplete","Operations", "Barcode Bad Print Quality","Operations", "Barcode Damaged","Operations", "Barcode out of Specification","Operations", "Customer Refusal to Barcode","Operations", "No Barcode","Operations", "Sorting/Routing Barcode obscured/damaged","Operations", "Declared Incorrect Product","Revenue", "Discrepancy has high impact","Revenue", "Discrepancy has low impact","Revenue", "Declared at higher pricing than actual category","Revenue", "Declared at lower pricing than actual category","Revenue", "Special services not declared","Revenue", "Declared higher pricing than actual","Revenue", "Declared lower pricing than actual","Revenue", "Dangerous goods declaration unsigned","Revenue", "Incorrect/ incomplete billing details","Revenue", "Incorrect/incomplete Mailing Statement","Revenue", "No mailing statement","Revenue", "No parcels with mailing statement","Revenue", "No/Incomplete Dangerous goods/Customs declaration","Revenue", "Customer contract details missing or incomplete","Revenue", "Incorrect/incomplete Manifest","Revenue", "No electronic copy of manifest provided","Revenue", "No hardcopy of manifest provided","Revenue", "Incorrect/ incomplete ULD label","Operations", "No ULD Label","Operations", "Breakage/Product Damage","Operations", "Over weight","Revenue/Operations", "Oversize dimensions","Revenue/Operations", "Prohibited or dangerous goods","Operations", "Sealing/Packaging","Operations", "No Postage Paid indicator","Operations", "No Return Address","Operations", "Incorrect Stamps used (International vs. Domestic)","Revenue/Operations", "Mixed country & metro","Operations", "Mixed states","Operations", "Incorrect/ incomplete label data","Operations", "ULD weight exceeds 600kg","Operations", "n/a")
CustomField.label: Impact AP
